list.name: spawn_items
list.comment: IMPORTANT: If you change the number of units spawned in any of these sets, make sure to update the statetree so that it checks the right number when determining whether there is enough population available to spawn units. ex, condition at 8581048452440993459

group.name: spawn_item
group.comment: Military wing reward, feudal age: 2 free spearmen, 2 free archer

group.name: spawn_item
group.comment: Military wing reward, castle age: 2 free camel riders

group.name: spawn_item
group.comment: Military wing reward, imperial age: 3 handcannons
